text:
Along with Reg 870, FOH
Chapter 16 contains the Division’s interpretative positions regarding Title III
of the Consumer Credit Protection Act (CCPA). The interpretations included in
this chapter provide guidance in the administration and enforcement of this
law. Procedural matters under the CCPA are covered in FOH 52v.
html: Along with Reg 870, FOH Chapter 16 contains the Division’s interpretative positions regarding Title III of the Consumer Credit Protection Act (CCPA). The interpretations included in this chapter provide guidance in the administration and enforcement of this law. Procedural matters under the CCPA are covered in FOH 52v.
